value.title: Microsoft CEO speaks on the future of artificial intelligence
value.excerpt: The CEO of OpenAI, the company responsible for ChatGPT, called on Congress today to regulate artificial intelligence. CNBC’s Andrew Ross Sorkin sat down with Microsoft’s CEO Satya Nadella to talk about both the concerns and benefits after his company invested billions in OpenAI.
